title: Which Hindi songs describe love best? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pehla Nasha ….❤❤ Chaahe Tum Kuch Naa Kaho, Maine Sun Liya Ke Saathi Pyaar Kaa Mujhe Chun Liya Chun Liyaaaa Maine Sun Liyaa Pehla Nasha Pehla Khummar Naya Pyaar Hai Naya Intezaar…. Karloo Mein Kya Apna Haal Aye Dil-e-Bekaraar Mere Dil-e-Bekaraar Tu Hi Bata Pehla Nasha Pehla Khummar……. Udthaa Hi Fhirun Inn Hawaaon Mein Kahin Yaa Mein Jhool Jaun Inn Ghattavon Mein Kahin Udthaa Hi Fhirun Inn Hawaaon Mein Kahi Yaa Mein Jhool Jaun Inn Ghattavon Mein Kahin Ek Kar Doo Aasman Aur Zameen Kaho Yaaron Kya Karu Kya Nahi…… Pehla Nasha Pehla Khummar Naya Pyaar Hai Naya Intezaar Karloo Mein Kya Apna Haal Aye Dil-e-Bekaraar Mere Dil-e-Bekaraar Tu Hi Bata Pehla Nasha Pehla Khummar Usne Baath Ki Kuch Aise Dang Se Sapne De Gaya Hazaaron Rang Ke Usne Baath Ki Kuch Aise Dang Se Sapne De Gaya Hazaaron Rang Ke Reh Jaaun Jaise Mein Haar Ke Aur Choome Woh Mujhe Pyaar Se Pehla Nasha Pehla Khummar❤❤

some great songs name i m giving you hope you will like it .i think every lover sing these song when they are in love.1)pehla nasa2)ishq wala love3) Tum Hi Ho 4)Tum Se H5)Muskuraane Ki Wajah 6)Tera Hone Laga Hoon7)Tose Naina Jab Se Mile

Guys I highly recommend all of you, just listen this song once “Tere Utte” by Rish. He is not much famous but his voice 😍, I can't explain. I love his every songs.  It's a romentic song. I request you all, who's reading my answer please listen. And tell me in comment box.

According to Ur thinking….which type of love feeling Ur. Eg like romantic ..etc etc..for Eg u think about Ur partner say I love u…..then Ur related thinking is to be I love u song….its has many thinking in love……and every thinking has its own song U can also make a own song according to Ur feeling.and happiness much more

Tum hi ho -from movie aashiqui 2Tum dena sath meraTera Mujhse hai pehle ka Nata koiI love you- bodyguardA thousand years by Christina peri(my personal favourite )I wanna grow old with youSad song by westlife (you can find it on youtube)
Ther are many songs are i like, like those meaning full emotional, breathless etc but one of the my best is from half girl freind tum mere ho is pal mere ho…. And stay you little…
Jagjeetsingh's gazal “ Jhooki jhooki si nazar, bekaraar hai ki nahi,, Daba daba saa sahi dil mey pyaar hai ki nahi...superb one, touches strings of heart.My favourite.
Kuch kuch hota hai Ishq wala love Tum se hi Tere sang Tara Ishq bulava Zehnaseeb Hans mat pagli Manwa lage Mitwa Pehla nasha
Khamoshiyan, Batein ye kabhi na, and tu has lamaha from Khamoshiyan Movie.
